mapper.select: SELECT a.COMMENT, a.COMMENTDATE, a.COMMENT_USER_ID, b.USER_ID, b.COMMUNITY_TITLE, b.COMMUNITY_CONTENT, b.COMMUNITY_DATE FROM comment AS a INNER JOIN community AS b ON a.COMMUNITY_ID = b.COMMUNITY_ID WHERE b.COMMUNITY_ID = #{COMMUNITY_ID};

SELECT comm.COMMUNITY_ID, ca.CATEGORY, comm.COMMUNITY_TITLE, comm.COMMUNITY_CONTENT, comm.USER_ID FROM project_diet.community as comm INNER JOIN category as ca ON comm.CATEGORY_ID = ca.CATEGORY_ID WHERE ca.CATEGORY_ID LIKE 'C%' order by COMMUNITY_DATE DESC;

select count(*) as cnt from community where 1=1
AND COMMUNITY_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')
AND USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')
;

SELECT comm.COMMUNITY_ID, ca.CATEGORY, comm.COMMUNITY_TITLE, comm.COMMUNITY_CONTENT, comm.USER_ID ,comm.COMMUNITY_DATE FROM project_diet.community as comm INNER JOIN category as ca ON comm.CATEGORY_ID = ca.CATEGORY_ID WHERE ca.CATEGORY_ID LIKE 'C%'
AND COMMUNITY_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')
AND USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')
order by COMMUNITY_DATE DESC limit #{pageBegin}, #{pageScale} ;
